description:
A cozy fleecy pullover for those times a hoodie just won’t cut it. Made from a super soft high-pile fleece, the Extreme Pile pullover traps warm air against your body, much like a quilt, keeping you comfortable on chilly days.

  • Thick high-pile fleece holds onto warm air
  • Recycled polyester fleece is light, wicks away moisture, and dries quickly
  • ½ zipper is great for temperature adjustments, and lets you keep your hat on when taking your fleece on and off
  • Nylon overlay on the collar stops chilly wind in its tracks
  • Zippered chest pocket keeps small necessities secure and close
  • Zippered kangaroo pocket keeps your hands warm and your phone within easy reach
  • Elastic piping at the hem and cuffs helps keep the toastiness in
  • Relaxed fit has a casual comfort that leaves room to layer
name: The North Face Extreme Pile Pullover - Men's
